DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at investigating the impact of colonic fermentation of intrinsic indigestible carbohydrates in cereal whole kernels after three days consumption, on metabolic variables and cognition. The study is performed in healthy, normal to slightly over-weight test subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Prebiotics as a Means to Modulate Gut Fermentation, Metabolism, Appetite and Cognition
DOC.criteria: BMI 1928 kg/m2 gastrointestinal diseases metabolic disorders tobacco/snuff user antibiotic/probiotic treatment
